## Create a vector

```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
```

```{r}
class(vec_1)

```
```{r}
typeof(vec_1)

vec_1[3]
```
```{r}
vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3] 


```

```{r}
vec_1[1]
```
```{r}
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
```

```{r}
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[1:5]
vec_1_e5to7
```
```{r}
  vec_1_char <- vec_1[]
```

```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", location = "Rincon", swell = "south")
```




```{r}
class(vec_2)

```


```{r}
length(vec_2)



```

```{r}
vec_2[2]
```

```{r}
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
vec_2_e2
```



## Data frame

```{r}
df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "C", "D"), 
                    species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale"),
                   count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))

```


```{r}
class(df_1)

```

```{r}
df1[[2]]
```
